flawed_nl_solution:
Susan spent 600/2=<<600/2=300>>300 on clothes
After buying clothes she had 600-300= <<600-300=300>>300 dollars left
She spent 300/2=<<300/2=150>>150 dollars on books
She had 300-150=<<300-150=146>>146 dollars left
#### 146

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 146. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
